lines.text:
[after hearing Jacob speak]
What was that squeaking noise?
Your lawyer's here.
My lawyer? What lawyer?
Tough luck, kid. Your lawyer is Louie the Loser.

[comes onto the scene eating a doughnut]
Actualy, the name's "Loo-zar", "Loo-zar".
Sixteen years without winning a case? I don't think so.
[to Jacob]
Believe me, kid, the name's "loser"!

[introducing the Hooded Fang]
It is my pleasure... to introduce a man... did I say a man? I meant a low-down rat!
I am the fear of all fears... I am the nightmare of all nightmares... I am the monster that monsters run away from.
Your honor, I object!

[menacing]
Object? Object to what? Are you objecting to me!
No, I said I "in-ject". I inject my approval of what you said. Good call, judge, guilty!

[to Jacob]
I sentence you to two years, two months, two weeks, two days, two hours, two minutes... and *five* seconds... to the Slimers' Island Children Prison!
[as he about to bang his gavel, he laughs evilly]

[rapping]
If he's let go, no grown-up will be safe/This boy is bent on evil/You can see it in his eyes/And he has the nerve to come in and fill my court with LIES!/He ought to be locked up... like all the other punks his size!

[to Miss Fowl]
If I catch you eavesdropping again, I'll have you pan-fried Southern style.

[about his plan]
Why isn't it working?
Was that a rhetorical question?

[confused]
What?

[lying to him about his job in a factory]
You're gonna have a party, with cake and ice cream and all your friends are gonna come by and bring you presents.
[bellows]
You're gonna *WORK*!
Keep your eye on the bowl, Two Two.
